price: Ọ̀rọ̀ (tí Ànábì - kí ìkẹ́ àti ọlà Allāhu máa bá a - ń sọ fún Allāhu ni pé): “Olúwa Mi, dájúdájú àwọn wọ̀nyí ni ìjọ tí kò gbàgbọ́.”
arabic: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waqīlihi yārabbi inna hāulāi qawmun lā yu'minūna
